Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boss

    public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Collidable
    Enemy Class that represents a single enemy unit in the game
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    srikrishna joshi
